archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.5.5d: d) deny outgoing traffic where the source address is known to have been spoofed (e.g. where the source address does not reflect the network from which it originates)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
